children.value: hook provides a way of consuming and modifying which blocks are currently selected.
Call the hook in the top-level of your component.

const {
  enabled,
  setEnabled,
  selection,
  setSelection,
  start,
  end,
  next,
  setNext,
  previous,
  setPrevious,
} = useSettings()
The hook returns an object with getters and setters related to block selection. Objects which modify the editor state are prefixed with
Dynamically add a new font size.
It's a big object. There is a bit of editorializing going on with the ordering here (most useful seeming stuff at the top).
